summary: A group of slackers who are living for free in a rock star's mansion find their sweet lives threatened when the musician decides to sell his pad.
cast: Josh Lawson|Clifton Collins Jr.|Brit Morgan|Kevin Sussman|Nat Faxon|Zoe Boyle|Warren Hutcherson|Olivia Munn|Jane Seymour|Dana Goodman|Julia Lea Wolov|Rochelle Greenwood|Nzinga Blake|Courtney Peldon|Brady Matthews|Morgan Snyder|Adam Duritz|Richard Perello|Alejandro Patiño|Gwendoline Yeo|Brian Rich|Anne-Marie Johnson|Carrie Clifford|Wallace Langham|Gemma Hayes|Ben Livingston|Jose Yenque|Jolie Martin|Paul Soter|Maja Miletich|Eurydice Davis|Steve Lemme|Erik Stolhanske|Jay Chandrasekhar|Matthew Pritzker|Kevin Heffernan|Peter Kim|Reiko Kaneshiro|Mike Siegel|Denise Richards|Garrett Morris|Dave Foley|Richard Branson|Victoria Cruz|Adam Donshik|Diane Gaeta|Coleman Gladis|Jessica Green|Amy Lynn Grover|Xango Henry|Lisa Hoover|Ted Joneson|Tess Kielhamer|Adam Knapp|Laci Knight|Matisse Mazur|Eros Mendoza|Natalie Morales|Taylor Nichols|Adam Rizzieri|Lawrence E Thomas|Shawn Williamson
title: Freeloaders
